title: Why MVC is so Important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code bewtween the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs Authorization
content: There is a difference between authenticatio and authorization. Authentication means confirming your own identity, whereas authorization means being allowed access to the system.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
content: I have really loved learning about ORM's. It really simplified the way I create queries and interact with my SQL databases.

title: Seeding a Database
content: Seeding a database is a process in which an initial set of data is provided to a database when it is being installed.

title: Using Sequelize
content: Sequelize is a promise-based Node.js ORM for Postgres, MySQL, MariaDB, SQLite and Microsoft SQL Server.

title: Using Handlebars
content: Handlebars is a simple templating language. It uses a template and an input object to generate HTML or other text formats.

title: Making Full-Stack Applications
content: I have really loved learning about ORM's. It really simplified the way I create queries and interact with my SQL databases.
